expression.exp: "\textsf{ The triangles are similar when\\ the ratios of the corresponding\\ sides are equal."

expression.label: MidDEFFinal
expression.exp: ((Max[Zip[x(n), n, {answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE, answerTriangleF}]] + Min[Zip[x(n), n, {answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE, answerTriangleF}]]) / 2, (Max[Zip[y(n), n, {answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE, answerTriangleF}]] + Min[Zip[y(n), n, {answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE, answerTriangleF}]]) / 2)

expression.label: solTriWidthHt
expression.exp: {Max[Zip[x(n), n, {NewAnswerD, NewAnswerE, NewAnswerF}]] - Min[Zip[x(n), n, {NewAnswerD, NewAnswerE, NewAnswerF}]], Max[Zip[y(n), n, {NewAnswerD, NewAnswerE, NewAnswerF}]] - Min[Zip[y(n), n, {NewAnswerD, NewAnswerE, NewAnswerF}]]}

Intersect[Ray[Rotate[MidBox1 + (0.5, 0), ((2 * pi) * n / 3), MidBox1], Rotate[(4, 0), ((2 * pi) * n / 3), MidBox1]], problemRegion1]

ggbscript.onUpdate:
# lock input objects
RunClickScript(scriptToggleFreezeInputBoxes)
#SetFixed(SimMove, %0, !%0)
# enable this when new input boxes are released (2E = 18% opacity) # If(validate, If(correct1, SetBackgroundColor(InputBox1, colorInputCorrect), SetBackgroundColor(InputBox1, colorInputIncorrect)),SetBackgroundColor(InputBox1, White)) # If(validate, If(correct2, SetBackgroundColor(InputBox2, colorInputCorrect), SetBackgroundColor(InputBox2, colorInputIncorrect)),SetBackgroundColor(InputBox2, White))
#If(%0, SetCoords(AnswerPoint, x(answerTriangleF), y(answerTriangleF)))
#If(%0, SetCoords(AnswerPoint, x(answerTriangleF), y(answerTriangleF)))

ggbscript.val:
# this part is exactly the same as in Quizzes (but Quizzes does not press our buttons!)
SetValue(validate, true)
SetValue(tries, tries+1)
SetValue(showhint, !correct && tries == 2)
SetValue(showanswer, !correct && tries==3)
SetValue(showsolution, !correct && tries==3)
#SetValue(moved, 0) #SetCoords(SimMoveCopy, 0, 0) SetValue(inputSaved, inputCurrent)
# this part is needed for operating the applet stand-alone (user presses our buttons)
SetValue(showhinttypicalerror, tries<=2 && isTypicalError)
SetValue(countCorrect, countCorrect + correct)
# this part is only needed if input boxes are used. in other cases the script in enableBtnValidate should be enough #SetFixed(btnValidate, true, false) #SetColor(btnValidate,colorGreyGrid) #SetBackgroundColor(btnValidate, colorInactiveButton)

ggbscript.onUpdate: #number of attempts
#the number of questions that were correct

ggbscript.val:
# this part is exactly the same as in Quizzes (but Quizzes does not press our buttons!)
SetValue(validate, false) SetCoords(SimMoveCopy, 0, 0)

# in Quizzes there's no "new task" button
SetValue(showanswer, false)
SetValue(showsolution, false)
SetValue(validate, false)
SetValue(tries, 0)
SetValue(showhint, false) SetValue(showhinttypicalerror, false)
SetValue(countQuestion, countQuestion + 1)
#SetValue(animationSlider, 0)
#SetValue(moved, 0) SetCoords(SimMoveCopy, 0, 0)
SetValue(numSolPage, 0) SetValue(inputSaved, {}) SetValue(PointMoved, false)
RunClickScript(scriptEmptyInputBoxes)
# unlock input objects RunClickScript(scriptToggleFreezeInputBoxes)

caption.val: No selection allowed for all input boxes
Fix position and allow selection for all text objects

ggbscript.val:
SetValue(SimMove, CopyFreeObject(randomSimStart)) SetCoords(SimMoveCopy, 0, 0)
RunClickScript(btnNew)
SetValue(countCorrect, 0)
SetValue(countQuestion, 0)
SetValue(tries, 0) SetValue(PointMoved, false) SetValue(onboarding,true)
StartAnimation(pulsing,true)

expression.label: helpTextHintTypicalError
expression.exp: "\text{Calculate using the\\ corresponding sides.\\ \[AB\] corresponds to \[DE\],\\\[BC\] corresponds to \[EF\],\\ \[CA\] corresponds to \[FD\].}"

input.a0: Zip[PixelsToPoint[Corner[1], Corner[3], Corner[5], A], A, {(pixelsLeft, pixelsTop), (pixelsLeft, y(Corner[5]) - pixelsBottom), Corner[5] - (pixelsRight, pixelsBottom), (x(Corner[5]) - pixelsRight, pixelsTop)}]

expression.label: textQuestion
expression.exp: "\textsf{Drag the point so that }\[Δ\it{ABC}\]\textsf{ is similar to }\[Δ\it{DEF}\]\textsf{.}"

#min x for entire app

ggbscript.val: #starting point for point F #on start, SimMove moves to this location #corresponds to point F

ggbscript.onUpdate: SetValue(SimMove, CopyFreeObject(randomSimStart))

ggbscript.val: #this is a copy of the moving point# it is used to enable the validate button #it updates any time SimMove is moved. #it will enable the button if the coordinates of SimMove match SimMoveCopy #it moves to (0,0) when app is reset so the coordinates don't match

ggbscript.onUpdate:
SetFixed(btnValidate, true, %0)
If(%0, SetValue(validate, false))
SetColor(btnValidate, If(%0, "White", colorGreyGrid)) SetBackgroundColor(btnValidate, If(%0, colorPurpleButton, colorInactiveButton))

ggbscript.val: SetValue(countQuestion, countQuestion+1)

#alignment point for big label for text

#alignment point for small label for text #Vertex(boxLabelDE, 1) + (width / 2 - abs(x(Corner(textSideDE, 1)) - x(Corner(textSideDE, 2))) / 2, (-height) / 2 + abs(y(Corner(textSideDE, 1)) - y(Corner(textSideDE, 3))) / 2)

expression.label: outsideSolutionDistances
expression.exp: {If[¬IsInRegion[NewAnswerD, solutionRegion], Distance[NewAnswerD, solutionRegion], 0], If[¬IsInRegion[NewAnswerE, solutionRegion], Distance[NewAnswerE, solutionRegion], 0], If[¬IsInRegion[NewAnswerF, solutionRegion], Distance[NewAnswerF, solutionRegion], 0]}

ggbscript.onUpdate: #this is to see if the user answer needs to be scaled down in the solution

ggbscript.val: SetValue(numSolPage, 1)
SetValue(numSolPage, numSolPage - 1)
SetValue(numSolPage, numSolPage + 1)

ggbscript.onUpdate: SetFixed(SimMove, !%0, %0)

startPoint.exp: (If[correct ∨ tries < 3, layoutX - 5, x(YourAnswerPointPix)], If[showanswer ∧ numSolPage ≟ 0, y(YourAnswerPointPix), layoutY + If[correct, 6, If[tries ≟ 3, 1, 51]]])

expression.label: InCentsABC
expression.exp: {ClosestPoint[Segment[randomPointA, randomPointB], InCentABC], ClosestPoint[Segment[randomPointB, randomPointC], InCentABC], ClosestPoint[Segment[randomPointC, randomPointA], InCentABC]}

expression.label: InCentsDEF
expression.exp: {ClosestPoint[Segment[answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE], InCentDEF], ClosestPoint[Segment[answerTriangleE, SimMove], InCentDEF], ClosestPoint[Segment[SimMove, answerTriangleD], InCentDEF]}

input.a2: {textSideAB, textSideBC, textSideAC, textSideDE, textSideEF, textSideDF, textSideDE, textSideEFAnswer, textSideFDAnswer}

input.a0: StartLabelABC(n) + (((-Element[sideTextDims, n, 1])) / 2, Element[sideTextDims, n, 2] / 2) - Element[sideTextDims, n, 3]
StartLabelDEF(n) + (((-Element[sideTextDims, n + 3, 1])) / 2, Element[sideTextDims, n + 3, 2] / 2) - Element[sideTextDims, n + 3, 3]

expression.label: InCentsDEF'
expression.exp: {ClosestPoint[Segment[NewAnswerD', NewAnswerE'], InCentDEFA], ClosestPoint[Segment[NewAnswerE', NewAnswerF'], InCentDEFA], ClosestPoint[Segment[NewAnswerF', NewAnswerD'], InCentDEFA]}

input.a0: StartLabelDEF'(n) + (((-Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 1])) / 2, Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 2] / 2) - Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 3]

expression.label: InCentsDEF''
expression.exp: {ClosestPoint[Segment[answerTriangleD, answerTriangleE], InCentDEFA'], ClosestPoint[Segment[answerTriangleE, answerTriangleF], InCentDEFA'], ClosestPoint[Segment[answerTriangleF, answerTriangleD], InCentDEFA']}

input.a0: StartLabelDEF''(n) + (((-Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 1])) / 2, Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 2] / 2) - Element[sideTextDims, n + 6, 3]
